title: Pathological and imaging features, treatment, and prognosis of primary intraventricular lymphoma: A review of cases from a single center
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Yuqiao Wang, Chengcheng Cui, Hafiz Khuram Raza, Hao Chen, Xiangbu Wang, Wei Zhang, Wenqing Meng, Keke Li, Zhifeng Mao, Xiujuan Sun, Shenyang Zhang
